name: Benyam Bereket
description: My cousin and friend who has matured greatly over the years. A hard worker who thirsts for more life.

name: Alem Habtay
description: The most persistant person I know. I've had the pleasure of growing up with you and witnessing the growth of the woman she is today.

name: Don'Shawn Cato
description: A friendship turnd brotherhood, Shawn gives life to the meaning of a brother.

name: Mela Dee Aray
description: A selfless woman I had the pleasure of being aquianted with not too long ago. I can count on her for consultation on all things where my own self-love may impair judgement.

name: Anthony Nutting
description: Probably the most easy going of all my friends, Anthony is an extremely intelligent, honest and caring person. Another friend who became a brother.

name: Alem Abai
description: A beautiful woman who turns anything she dreams into something tanglible. Success is this womans personal trainer and her future holds greatness.

name: Rudas Gebregiorgis
description: One of the closest people to me who is capable of so much more than what he chooses for himself, although his intensity in pursuit for his desires is unmatched.

name: Finan Yohannes
description: A woman of uncompromising character, of unmatched beauty deserving of the highest calibur of love. To converse with this woman is life changing.
